  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void applyDiscount​(int[] cost)
    given a Card cost a discount is applied if the player has a leader card discount (and if the resource affected is greater than zero)
    boolean canIPayForProductions​(int[] cost)
    checks if a cost can be payed with the resources that a player has in this moment.
    boolean checkForDiscountLeader​(int leader)
    given the leader (only if it's the first or second) this method checks if the card is playable via the discountLeader check.
    boolean checkForProductionLeader​(int leader)
    checks if a leader is playable under the production conditions. if a leader which is not a production leader is checked the result will always be false
    boolean checkForStorageLeader​(int leader)
    checks if the Leader selected is playable under the storage conditions.
    boolean checkForWhiteBallLeader​(int leader)
    checks if a leader is playable under the white ball conditions. if a leader which is not a white ball leader is checked the result will always be false
    boolean[] doIHaveADiscountLeader()
    returns a double boolean stating if each leader is a discount leader (if that leader is played) or not
    boolean[] doIHaveAProductionLeader()
    returns a double boolean stating if each leader is a production leader (if that leader is played) or not
    boolean[] doIHaveAWhiteBallLeader()
    returns an double boolean stating if each leader is a whiteball leader (and is played) or not

    • playLeader

      public boolean playLeader​(int switcher) throws AlreadyPlayedOrDiscardedLeader
      method that is used to play a leader, it does all the checks and play the leader if possible.
      Parameters:
      switcher - indicates first or second leader card
      Returns:
      true if played, false otherwise
      Throws:
      AlreadyPlayedOrDiscardedLeader

    • switchLeader

      public LeaderCard switchLeader​(int leader)

    • checkForDiscountLeader

      public boolean checkForDiscountLeader​(int leader)
      given the leader (only if it's the first or second) this method checks if the card is playable via the discountLeader check. If the card is not a discount leader the result will always be false so there is no problem of false leader checks
      Parameters:
      leader - 1 or 2 depending on which leader the client wants to play
      Returns:
      true if playable, false otherwise

    • checkForWhiteBallLeader

      public boolean checkForWhiteBallLeader​(int leader)
      checks if a leader is playable under the white ball conditions. if a leader which is not a white ball leader is checked the result will always be false
      Parameters:
      leader - 1 or 2 stating which leader the client chose
      Returns:
      true if playable, false otherwise

    • checkForProductionLeader

      public boolean checkForProductionLeader​(int leader)
      checks if a leader is playable under the production conditions. if a leader which is not a production leader is checked the result will always be false
      Parameters:
      leader - 1 or 2 stating which leader the client chose
      Returns:
      true if playable, false otherwise

    • checkForStorageLeader

      public boolean checkForStorageLeader​(int leader)
      checks if the Leader selected is playable under the storage conditions. If a leader is not a storage leader the result will always be false
      Parameters:
      leader - 1 or 2 stating which leader the client chose
      Returns:
      true if playable, false otherwise

    • doIHaveAWhiteBallLeader

      public boolean[] doIHaveAWhiteBallLeader()
      returns an double boolean stating if each leader is a whiteball leader (and is played) or not
      Returns:
      double boolean, has true if the leader is a PLAYED white ball leader, false otherwise

    • doIHaveADiscountLeader

      public boolean[] doIHaveADiscountLeader()
      returns a double boolean stating if each leader is a discount leader (if that leader is played) or not
      Returns:
      boolean[i]=true if the leader i is played AND is a discount leader, false in any other case

    • doIHaveAProductionLeader

      public boolean[] doIHaveAProductionLeader()
      returns a double boolean stating if each leader is a production leader (if that leader is played) or not
      Returns:
      boolean[i]=true if the leader i is played AND is a production leader, false in any other case

    • payForACard

      public void payForACard​(int[] costo) throws NotEnoughResources
      automatic payment (don't need to be checked first but should be checked for discount leaders). The payment is frist made in the storage, while the remaining is made in the strongbox
      Parameters:
      costo - cost of the card
      Throws:
      NotEnoughResources - the check is made "just to be sure", but the method should be called only when it's has already checked that the player can pay for the card.

    • payForProductions

      public void payForProductions​(int[] costo) throws NotEnoughResources
      method that pays for a production action. The method behaves in the same way the payForACard method, but avoids checking for a discount
      Parameters:
      costo - cost calcuated by the controller
      Throws:
      NotEnoughResources - if the cost is not payable by the player

    • applyDiscount

      public void applyDiscount​(int[] cost)
      given a Card cost a discount is applied if the player has a leader card discount (and if the resource affected is greater than zero)
      Parameters:
      cost - cost of the card

    • canIPayForProductions

      public boolean canIPayForProductions​(int[] cost)
      checks if a cost can be payed with the resources that a player has in this moment.
      Parameters:
      cost - total cost checked
      Returns:
      true if the player has enough resources to pay the cost, false otherwise

    • whichProductionIsUsable

      public boolean[] whichProductionIsUsable()
      returns a message containing all the productions that can (ideally) be activated. The control is just:
      if the basic production can be activated (the player has at least 2 resources),
      if the resources are greater than 0 and for each slot at least one card is present,
      if each leader is played an is a production leader.
      Returns:
      boolean array stating which production is ideally activatable (to ease the choice client-side)

    • updateVictoryPoints

      public void updateVictoryPoints​(boolean alsoCheckResources)
      method that updates the player victory points. It checks if the player gets any points from resources in some cases
      Parameters:
      alsoCheckResources - if given true the method checks for victory points given by resources

    • hasPlayerFinished

      public boolean hasPlayerFinished()
      method that checks if a player has reached an end game status
      Returns:
      true if a player has reached an end game status, false otherwise (faithTrack completed OR 7 development cards obtained)
